test.name: Login Test

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Focus To Element
kw.doc: Sets the focus to the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Agilis | eCommerce Platform Provider for the Chemical Industry'.

kw.name: Current Frame Should Contain
kw.arg: This website uses cookies to enhance the user experience.These cookies are used to collect information about how you interact with our website and allow us to remember you. We use this information in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current frame contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current frame contains text 'This website uses cookies to enhance the user experience.These cookies are used to collect information about how you interact with our website and allow us to remember you. We use this information in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media.'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Set Focus To Element
kw.doc: Sets the focus to the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath:(//div[@class="_2ClPktuQN1IdZ1KO1AWQA-"]/h2)[1]' contains exact text 'Our Trusted Partners'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: select window
kw.arg: title=Palmer Holland Health & Nutrition eCommerce Portal Home
kw.msg: No keyword with name 'select window' found.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
